social-projects.title: Hakim Hub
social-projects.content: HakimHub is a platform that provides information about healthcare facilities and healthcare professionals in Ethiopia. Hakimhub makes information about hospitals, medical laboratories, and doctors conveniently accessible to its users.

social-projects.title: Track Sym
social-projects.content: TrackSym is a non-commercial app that uses crowd-sourcing to collect and visualize the density of the relevant Covid-19 symptoms. Symptom data, aggregated by places, can help people avoid visiting areas that are heavily populated by symptomatic people.

a2sv-sessions.title: Bi-weekly contests
a2sv-sessions.content: Contests help us to get better at competitive programming and problem-solving. We use online platforms like Leetcode and Codeforces.

a2sv-sessions.title: Technical Training
a2sv-sessions.content: 6 days a week, 3 hours of lectures and practice sessions to improve technical problem-solving skills.

a2sv-sessions.title: Q&As
a2sv-sessions.content: In Q&As, we get to know engineers, founders, and entrepreneurs from top tech companies. We see that they are normal people like us and we learn the best practices.

a2sv-sessions.title: Problem Solving Sessions
a2sv-sessions.content: We solve technical problems on a whiteboard while explaining to the class. It helps to get a feel of an interview environment.

a2sv-sessions.title: Learn How to Approach Sessions
a2sv-sessions.content: Students observe how an experienced problem solver approaches a problem from understanding it to implementing a working solution.

a2sv-sessions.title: Bi-weekly 1-1s
a2sv-sessions.content: In 1:1s, we can talk about anything that matters; clearly no boundaries. The more we speak our minds without a filter, the better for the team.

activities.title: Internships
activities.description: Students who passed their interviews got 3-month internships to gain experience in building scalable products that are widely used around the world.

activities.title: 360° Training
activities.description: A2SV upskills students with a 360° software engineering program that focuses on problem-solving, effective speaking, and personal development.

activities.title: Social Projects
activities.description: Students work on social projects with industry experts to address the most pressing problems in their community.
activities.altText: Picture of students participating in social activities

story.heading: My A2SV Experience
story.paragraph: I heard about Africa to Silicon Valley from my friends and I was excited to join. Before joining A2SV I dreamt about solving real-world problems and attaining something that I could focus on and make myself better from it. At that time, it is safe to say, I knew very little about data structure and algorithms. It was because of the A2SV program that I got comfortable with algorithms. From the program, students also learn about improving communication skills and being confident besides acquiring problem-solving skills.

story.heading: What I did/I am doing now
story.paragraph: Google is a great place to work. You will work with the brightest minds in the world and find yourself moving forward. Their culture is great and inclusive, especially their free food!

story.heading: How the A2SV program changed my life
story.paragraph: I believe I would have not made it to Google if not for A2SV. In fact, I would not have got this far if it wasn't for A2SV. I don't even think we would have such type of opportunities if it was not for this organization. Previously, I used to think working at FAANG was impossible for us but A2SV changed my mindset. Now, we know that it is possible to work anywhere as long as one works hard and utilizes opportunities.
